https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/gvVepCCOm5b8xxOTFEE2RU70n82.jpg In 1997, the year Ellen DeGeneres comes out, John is a boy who dreams of becoming a cop. He wants to confide in his neighbor, Mr. Carter, that he is secretly in love with him. Time is of the essence as the 65-year-old heterosexual detective is moving away forever. Alone with Mr. Carter
